name: BEST WESTERN Plus Otay Valley Hotel

reviews.text: For $80 dollars a night, we could not have asked for more. 2 exits away from TJ; a continental breakfast; nice normal clean rooms (typical, nothing outstanding). Great place and location if you're going to TJ. Gas stations and Taquerias everywhere in avery clean part of the city!
reviews.title: No complaints!
Adequate
reviews.text: We decided to try this hotel since it was very close to an autoshow we attended over the weekend. The price was a little high for a one night stay but the distance to the Coors Ampitheatre was a plus. The hotel is currently renovating so the lobby was bare.

description: Offering an ideal location for business and leisure travel right off the 805 freeway, Best Western Plus Otay Valley is conveniently located close to Otay Mesa business park and is only 5 min from Tijuana Mexico.Best Western is also the closest hotel to the new Aquatica park by seaworld and the Sleeptrain amphitheater.
